title: Remove principal ID and avatar option from profile interface

requirements.text: In the ProfilePage component (frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx), remove the principal ID display field/section that shows the user's Internet Identity principal.

quotes: Remove principal id and avtar option from profile button

acceptanceCriteria: Principal ID is no longer visible in the ProfilePage UI
Any labels, text fields, or copy buttons related to principal ID are removed
Profile page layout adjusts properly without the principal ID section

requirements.text: In the ProfilePage component (frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx), remove the avatar URL input field and any related UI elements for avatar configuration.

quotes: Remove principal id and avtar option from profile button

acceptanceCriteria: Avatar URL input field is removed from the profile form
Avatar-related labels, placeholders, and helper text are removed
Profile form no longer sends or updates avatar data when saving changes
Form validation and submission logic handles the absence of avatar field correctly

requirements.text: In the MobileMenu component (frontend/src/pages/MobileMenu.tsx), if the user's principal ID is displayed in the profile section, remove it from the UI.

quotes: Remove principal id and avtar option from profile button

acceptanceCriteria: Principal ID is not shown in the mobile menu profile section
User profile display in mobile menu shows only display name
Layout remains visually balanced without principal ID

requirements.text: If avatar images are currently displayed in any profile-related UI components (ProfilePage, MobileMenu, Header user menu), remove the avatar image rendering and replace with display name initials or a simple placeholder icon.

quotes: Remove principal id and avtar option from profile button

acceptanceCriteria: Avatar images are no longer fetched or displayed from avatar URLs
Profile displays use initials or placeholder icons instead of custom avatars
All avatar-related image loading logic is removed or disabled

constraints: Do not modify backend profile data structure; only change frontend UI rendering
Preserve all other profile functionality (display name editing, orientation lock toggle)
Maintain existing profile update mutation logic for remaining fields
nonGoals: Removing avatar data from backend storage or API
Changing how avatars work in OnlineUsers list or other user display contexts
